MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet
Unique: 1
Rarity: Uncommon
Boosts: RollBonus(SavingThrow, 1, Constitution)**
PassivesOnEquip: MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Passive

MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe
Unique: 1
Rarity: Rare
